```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

data(nyc_airbnb)

nyc_airbnb =
  nyc_airbnb |> 
  rename(borough = neighbourhood_group) |> 
  mutate(stars = review_scores_location/2)

view(nyc_airbnb)
  
```
